item.name: MySQL: Qcache hits
item.description: количество запросов, результаты которых были взяты из кеша

item.name: MySQL: Qcache queries in cache
item.description: количество запросов, которые находятся в кеше

item.name: MySQL: Queries
item.description: The number of statements executed by the server. This variable includes statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Questions variable. It does not count COM_PING or COM_STATISTICS commands. This variable was added in MySQL 5.0.76.

item.name: MySQL Created tmp files on disk
MySQL Created tmp tables on disk
MySQL Created tmp tables on memory
MySQL Key reads from disk
item.description: The number of physical reads of a key block from disk.

item.name: MySQL key reads requests
item.description: The number of requests to read a key block from the cache.

item.name: MySQL Qcache inserts
item.description: количество запросов, которые были добавлены в кеш

item.name: MySQL Qcache lowmem prunes
item.description: количество запросов, которые были удалены из кеша из-за нехватки памяти;

item.name: MySQL Qcache not cached
item.description: The number of noncached queries (not cacheable, or not cached due to the query_cache_type setting).

item.name: MySQL Questions
item.description: The number of statements executed by the server. As of MySQL 5.0.72, this includes only statements sent to the server by clients and no longer includes statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Queries variable. This variable does not count COM_PING, COM_STATISTICS, COM_STMT_PREPARE, COM_STMT_CLOSE, or COM_STMT_RESET commands.

item.name: MySQL status
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item.name: MySQL version
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.version, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

trigger.name: MySQL: Lack of available qcache memory
MySQL: Version of mysql was changed
